Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: What is in review? Link to CR? The overview in v1.0-alpha wasn't much.

Action.author: nickgaski
Action.body: I'm going to leave this open for the time being. We are planning on creating a diagram to outline the high level components and then provide a brief description of the network topology and various interactions...

Action.author: nickgaski
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris - yes it's a big To Do. thanks for updating

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Might be better to put in what we have, and then create a new issue for the topology.

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: I sent the diagram of FAB-37 to Design to create a pretty version, however we can just use what's there for now, and change out the image later.

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: Joe, Anthony O'Dowd, are leading this now, should have some items submitted by 5/12
